K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:30b-1: a'arya a'a ka sha garbha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-0: @31a *// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-4: bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-7: grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang de'i tshe na nub phyogs na brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bum phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-9: yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31a-13: gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-0: rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba @31b chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu rin po che snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-1: lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-2: brjod du med pa; nam mkha' bzhin du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-6: sems can gang dag der 'dus pa de dag kyang bdag kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-7: gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-8: de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-9: bdag bdag gi lus kyi gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-12: rig pa'ang mi dmigs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-13: gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-14: nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang mi mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-19: rlung gi khams kyang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-20: sgra dag kyang rna lam du grag par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-21: dri dag kyang sna la bro bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-22: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-24: skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-25: yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:31b-26: phyogs gang dang gang du brtags pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-0: de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i @32a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-4: gzugs su mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-5: rgyang ma nas kyang brgya byin thogs pa'i rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-6: gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-7: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-8: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-9: srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas 'jigs par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-12: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi sa yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-14: stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-15: de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-17: skrag par mi byed do; ;gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32a-33: mi ma yin pa 'dus pa de dag ma lus par 'jigs par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-0: skyo bar gyur nas tshu rol dang pha rol la rmongs shing sems 'khrugs nas de dag @32b gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-3: 'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes dri ba'ang gang yang mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-4: yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu chen po zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-5: chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-6: gang zag gang dag ma 'tshal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-7: gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-8: dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-9: phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-10: gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-11: 'di la gang zag kha cig ni; ;sangs rgyas chos la the tshom 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-13: chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-14: de dag tshu rol pha rol la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-15: bzod pa'i nam mkha'i mtshan 'tshal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-16: 'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-17: brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-18: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-19: spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-20: nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-21: gang dag la ni rgyang nas gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-22: sems can de dag skal pa che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-23: dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-24: ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-25: de dag thams cad shes rab che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-26: de ring 'dir ni zab mo'i gtam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-28: bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:32b-29: sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-0: @33a *// sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-1: 'di ni dpa' bo' spyod yul lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-3: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-4: gang na kun gzhi thos gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-5: shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-6: de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-7: de ni nam mkha'i snying po yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-9: snang ba med cing smros med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-10: ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-11: lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-12: phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-13: rtag dang chad la chags pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-14: pha rol tshu rol shin tu rmongs; ;lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-15: rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-16: brjod pa med pa sgom par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-17: de ni myur du sa thob 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-19: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-20: ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jigs pa shes par byas nas de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi skye mi 'gag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-22: cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33a-23: ci nas kyang rtag ba dang chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-2: chos thams cad la chags par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-3: de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing phyin chad kyang chad pa dang rtag pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas 'khor der lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-7: shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-9: byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa; ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-11: bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-13: rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-14: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-18: sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-19: bum pa bzang po lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-20: mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:33b-22: lam stor pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-1: kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-2: sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de ltung ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-5: phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams kyi ni; me tog lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-6: sdom pa spyod pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-8: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yu do pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-10: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-11: stegs lta bu; pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-13: mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-15: tshigs ngan pa dang skur pas gdungs pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-17: pha rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-21: bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-23: slabs pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-33: ngad pa rnams kyi ni; mal lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-34: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-36: byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-38: skyed mos tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-40: byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-41: phrang ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34a-42: rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-0: rigs kyi bu de @34b sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-1: nor bu yid bzhin lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-2: rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-4: gcod pa'i phyir lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-6: 'joms pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-10: thabs dang ldan pa rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-16: rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-18: nyan thos thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-24: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-28: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-30: sbyin gnas kyi sems can thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-32: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni; shing rta lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-33: rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-35: chos kyi grong khyer gyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:34b-37: rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-0: thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes @35a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-2: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyi; da khyed 'dir lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-3: mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-12: snod sna tshogs kyis bkur stir gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-18: bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-19: khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-20: snod du gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-21: de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa mtha' dag stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te snying ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-25: mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35a-26: 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-0: lha'i dbang po dang @35b klu'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-1: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-3: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-4: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-6: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-7: drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-8: bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la bkod pa'i mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur sti bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-9: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che sna bdun las byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-18: dri nga ba la sogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-19: med la lag mthil lta bur mnyam par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-20: des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-21: shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-25: 'bras bu dang ldan par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-29: 'dab ma sa la brten pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-30: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na'ang nad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:35b-32: sems can dmyal ba pa dang; dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-1: rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-2: sems can dag gis kyang zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-6: rgyan dag thong bar gyur to; ;de'i tshe gang dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-8: mdzes pa; blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-9: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing yan lag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-11: rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-13: nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-17: dge ba thams cad la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-20: sems rab tu dad par gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na'ang nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so dang 'tsham pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-21: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-22: nor bu rin po che de dag las kyang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36a-23: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-0: gos bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang @36b rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-1: me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-2: spos sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-3: phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-4: gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-5: snod sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-6: 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-9: mu tig gi se mo do dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-13: padma dkar po dang; au ra ga sa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-14: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-15: shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-16: tsandan sa mchog pa'i phye mas lam der bkram par mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-17: lam de'i g-yas g-yon gnyis kar rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang ba dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bzang yang mngon par sprul nas khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi chung ma dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-20: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrog cing rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la lha'i nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-22: mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis legs par brgyan pa mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:36b-23: rgyan de dag las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan man lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-3: 'bras bu la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung ste sa la brten pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyen las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung bar grag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-4: sgra de gang gi rnar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-5: de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i bkod pa chen po de mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-7: rmad du byung ba'i chos thob nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji lta bur bsham snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-9: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che las byas pa'i me tog padma sdong bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-14: rin po che rngo'i snying po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-16: nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-17: rgyar ni; rgyang phrags gcig tsam yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-18: me tog padma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa 'bum phrag dums yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i padma byung nas padma'i steng de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37a-19: de'i spyi bo la'ang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-0: de bzhin @37b du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i g-yog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang gi padma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-1: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo byams pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-2: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-6: bkod chen dag kyang bstan gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-7: ston la phyag kyang ma btsal bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-8: stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-9: sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-10: skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-11: sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-12: rtog pa kun la mi gnas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-13: sems can du ni mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-14: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-15: yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-16: de ltar sems can mi mthong na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-17: bkod pa che 'di ci phyir bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-18: the tshom gyur pa bshad pa mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-19: sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-20: kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-21: byis pas don dam mi shes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:37b-22: sems can yongs smin bya ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-2: don dam gyis ni sdug bsngal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-3: de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-4: mkhas pas kun rdzob bden pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-7: zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-8: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-9: byis pa so so'i skye bo sems can thams cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig gis spyod yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-11: rnam par grol ba mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-12: yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur na'ang de dag gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig gi spyod yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-14: rnam par grol ba mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-15: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-16: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-17: dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-18: gal te sems can thams cad bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38a-20: don dam pa la brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-0: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i @38b sbyor ba ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-1: yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-2: gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so so rig pa thob pa; dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-4: don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyi rlabs mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-5: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-7: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-8: ji ltar da ltar nga'i 'dus pa chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes nas ji ltar 'di na sems can kha cig bkod pa chen po 'di'i phyir 'ong zhing ting nge 'dzin dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:38b-12: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mongs ma yin pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-0: sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar byas nas de'i 'og tu sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas sgrub pa'i @39a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa chen pa'ang bstan pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-3: gal te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i bkod pa ston du zin na; lha ngang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i bar du'ang bslad par 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-6: sbyor ba'i mtshan ma ston par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-7: de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-9: thabs shes pa la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-12: ye shes gzhan la rag ma las pa la mkhas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o; ;rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-14: sems can thams cad mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-15: thar par skye bar ston pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-16: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs su thar par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39a-17: lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nang gsol bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-0: sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog slad nas mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming rjod @39b par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-3: aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-5: de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-7: de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel ba ci 'dra ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-11: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-12: tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam; sgom pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-13: de dag thams cad rmi lam ma'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-15: de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis ston te; thabs des lta ba ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-17: smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-19: ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-20: ci nas kyang de'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-22: yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-24: dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang bsten par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-25: myur du dri mi zhim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-27: sdig pa'i lta ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:39b-28: de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i lam thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-0: @40a *// legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-1: de dag myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-2: zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-3: gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-4: gang yang sems g-yengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-5: gang dag gi mig gi bar chad byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-7: gang dag gi yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-8: gal te de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-9: nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par byed cing aa ga ru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-10: rgya spos kyis bdugs nas skyes bu dam pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag btsal nas rigs kyi bu de ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40a-22: bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-0: de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman dang yo byad du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston cing @40b nad pa'i sbyor ba gcig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-1: de bzhin du gang zhal ta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-3: gang kha ton dang thos par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-5: gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-7: gang yang grags pa 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-8: gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-18: gang tshul khrims 'dod pa nas gang shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-20: gang sems can rnams dang mthun par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-21: gang sdig pa las thar par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-22: gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas shes rab la gzhog pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-25: sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gzhog par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-26: tshul khrims 'chal pa dag tshul khrims la gzhog par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-27: le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gzhog par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:40b-28: de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-0: gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing bdag la @41a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-1: lta zhing sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-7: bla gab med par aa ga ru dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-23: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-26: sarba sha me stha p'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-29: ru ti bi be ka gung dri shti bi be ka gung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-30: p'u ra ya k'a ru ni ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-31: p'u r'a ya na tu ma ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-32: aa sha sarba pa na tha tsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-33: aa sho ka ga ti sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-34: sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas te nyal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41a-40: de'i bsod nams kyi skal pa ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41b-0: @41b chag gas de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:41b-1: thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:47a-10: des tho rangs kyi thun la aa ga ru'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:47a-14: tha mal bar 'dug ste chos 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:47a-18: bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar du 'dug ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:47b-1: bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i spyod pa zab pa thabs mkhas pa'ang de la ston par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:47b-10: byang chub sems dpa' des skya rengs 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te skya rengs la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-1: rengs shar ma thag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa ltung ba byung ba de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-2: ye shes kyi thabs chen pos de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba'ang 'chags su 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-3: thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-4: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-5: theg pa chen po la'ang shin tu gnas par 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-7: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-11: de'i phyir khyod myur du 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-12: zhes ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar du de skad zer na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48a-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la zhig la kye khyod kyi so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-1: khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-2: theg pa chen po lhogs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-8: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-9: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la zhig la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-13: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spang bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-15: de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-17: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-18: khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-19: theg pa chen po nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:48b-20: khyod theg pa chen po lhogs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-0: zhes de skad smras nas gal te de @49a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-1: de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu len par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-2: gnyis ka'ang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-4: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-6: gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing theg pa chen po 'di'ang sgra grags pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-15: theg pa chen po pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-18: zhes de skad zer zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la phrag dog tu byed la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49a-20: yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la de'i rkyen gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:49b-6: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa phrag dog gi phyir brdzun du smras pa'i rkyen gyis ltung ba lci ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:50a-3: chos 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:50a-5: bklags pa tsam gyis bstan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:50b-0: mir rnyed pa shin tu @50b dkon pa rnyed nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod pa las rnyed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:51a-14: chen po bstan pa la mi lta /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:51b-17: dge slong bsam gtan pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:51b-26: sa dag la snod du gyur pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58a-20: nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi don bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thogs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58a-26: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58a-29: nam mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyis rdul 'thul zhing rlung gis dkrugs pas yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58a-31: zhi bar byed cing dri ma med la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-3: zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-10: lo rnams kyi bgrang ba'ang mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-13: rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-14: sems can rnams kyi glo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-15: de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-16: sems nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-17: de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-18: de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis tshi ma par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-19: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-21: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:58b-23: sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-1: du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-7: nam mkha' mig la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-11: ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-14: ci mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-17: gang yang nang du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-21: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-27: nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun tu rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-29: bcom ldan 'das; de ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59a-32: sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-0: rigs @59b kyi bu; 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-1: nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-5: de skad cig bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-6: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-8: gcig la gcig mi rten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-9: gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-16: de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-19: rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-27: rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-29: rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-31: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-32: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-34: bcom ldan 'das; bya ba r'a dza /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-37: dza na ni ma mu ni ha ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:59b-40: ni ya ma su ri n'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-3: sha ma tse ta n'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-4: kle sh'anta sam sho sha ne sv'a h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-8: khyod kyis mig las rgyal bar byed pa'i sengge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe tha ma'i rnam par shes pa la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-10: chos kyi sgrib pa yod pa sbrug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-15: sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-20: rgyal po'i pho brang du gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-22: spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdos de sna tshogs 'chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-23: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-24: rgyal rigs gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol ba'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-25: thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-27: mi'i skye rgu dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-28: grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60a-30: bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-0: gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la @60b ye shes skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-2: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-3: sems can dag gi gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-4: de dag gi ni gzhi yi rtsa ba spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-5: myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-6: rtsa ba'i gzhi por thams cad 'gyur bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-11: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-067-003:60b-12: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
